title: Break Yurgir's Contract
content:
Raphael's Old Enemy (and get the Umbral Gem next to him). Magic Missile and Spirit Guardians are the perfect choice of spells for multi-single target and AoE damage during the fight against the Swarm of Rats. Even if you failed to help Yurgir here, you can still persuade him to join your cause when fighting Rapheal in House of Hope.

All Quests in Baldur's Gate 3 Acquire the Gauntlets for Helsik ♦ Aid the Underduke ♦ Ask the Goblin Priestess for Help ♦ Avenge Glut's Circle ♦ Avenge the Drowned
